platforms.name: Elastic Semantic Search
platforms.description: Elastic Semantic Search is a vector search and retrieval platform integrated into the Elastic Stack (Elasticsearch, Kibana) that enables AI-powered, context-aware search beyond keyword matching. It uses machine learning models to generate and query vector embeddings, allowing users to find semantically similar results, power conversational AI, and enhance enterprise search with natural language understanding. Its key differentiator is the deep integration of vector search into a mature, scalable, and widely-adopted enterprise search and observability ecosystem, offering hybrid search capabilities that combine traditional BM25 with modern kNN vector search.
keyFeatures: Dense vector search (kNN) for semantic similarity
Support for third-party and custom embedding models (e.g., from OpenAI, Cohere, Hugging Face)
Hybrid search combining BM25 (keyword) and vector search for improved relevance

platforms.name: Vectara
platforms.description: Vectara is a neural search and retrieval platform that provides developers with a fully-managed API for building conversational search and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) applications. Its key capability is an end-to-end system that handles document ingestion, embedding, retrieval, and grounded generation, eliminating the need to manage separate vector databases and LLMs. It uniquely focuses on 'grounded generation' to minimize hallucinations by ensuring all AI responses are directly supported by retrieved source data.
keyFeatures: Fully-managed neural search API with built-in embedding models and re-ranking
Automatic chunking and ingestion for documents (PDF, Word, HTML, TXT) and text
Built-in hybrid search combining dense vector retrieval with keyword-based methods

platforms.name: Coveo Relevance Cloud
platforms.description: Coveo Relevance Cloud is an AI-powered search and relevance platform that unifies data from multiple sources to deliver personalized search, recommendations, and insights across digital properties. Its core capability is using machine learning to understand user intent and behavior in real-time, adapting content and product results dynamically. It uniquely targets large-scale enterprises and e-commerce businesses by combining a powerful, cloud-native platform with extensive no-code tools for business users, aiming to maximize conversion, revenue, and productivity.
keyFeatures: Unified Indexing: Connects and indexes content from CRM, CMS, e-commerce platforms, internal databases, and more into a single searchable index.
Intent-Based AI Ranking: Machine learning models that go beyond keywords to interpret user intent, context, and behavior to rank results.
Real-Time Adaptive Recommendations: Dynamically surfaces personalized content, products, and knowledge articles based on individual user profiles and session activity.

platforms.name: Glean AI Search
platforms.description: Glean is an enterprise AI search and knowledge discovery platform that connects to and indexes a company's entire suite of applications and data sources, including Google Workspace, Microsoft 365, Slack, Salesforce, Jira, and more. It uses natural language processing to understand user intent and provide highly relevant, contextual answers, citations, and summaries, while enforcing strict access controls based on user permissions. It uniquely focuses on solving the 'findability' problem in large enterprises by building a deep understanding of organizational relationships and content relevance, not just keyword matching.
keyFeatures: Unified search across 100+ connected SaaS apps (Slack, Teams, Drive, Confluence, etc.)
Natural language query understanding with conversational follow-ups
Answer generation with direct citations to source documents and snippets

platforms.name: SearchIQ
platforms.description: SearchIQ is an AI-powered enterprise search and knowledge discovery platform that connects to and indexes data from documents, databases, emails, and SaaS applications. Its core capability is understanding natural language queries to deliver precise, cited answers, enabling employees to find information conversationally. It uniquely targets knowledge-intensive organizations by combining semantic search with granular access controls, ensuring users only see results they are permitted to access.
keyFeatures: Natural Language Query Processing using transformer-based models
Unified indexing across 100+ data sources (Google Drive, Slack, SQL DBs, Confluence, etc.)
Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) with inline citations and source references

platforms.name: QueryCraft
platforms.description: QueryCraft is an AI-powered enterprise search and analytics platform that allows users to query complex internal data using natural language. It connects to a wide array of data sources like SQL databases, data warehouses, cloud storage, and SaaS APIs, translating questions into structured queries and returning answers with direct citations to the source data. It uniquely focuses on governed, secure data access for business teams, enabling self-service analytics without compromising on row-level security or audit trails.
keyFeatures: Natural Language to SQL/Query Translation for databases like Snowflake, BigQuery, and PostgreSQL
Source Citation & Provenance Tracking showing exact database rows or document snippets used in answers
Granular Permission Controls & Row-Level Security (RLS) integration with existing IAM systems

platforms.name: Apex
platforms.description: Apex is an enterprise AI search platform that connects to a company's internal data sources—including documents, emails, databases, and chats—to provide employees with accurate, sourced answers to their questions. It uniquely enforces existing permission models, ensuring users only see information they are authorized to access, making it a secure gateway to organizational knowledge. Its key capabilities include deep data connectivity, permission-aware answer generation, and integration with collaboration tools like Slack and Microsoft Teams.
keyFeatures: Connects to 100+ data sources (Google Drive, SharePoint, Slack, Confluence, SQL DBs, etc.)
Generates answers with inline citations and source document links
Enforces granular, role-based access control (RBAC) for all queries

platforms.name: Danswer
platforms.description: Danswer is an open-source AI-powered enterprise search and knowledge assistant that connects to your company's internal data sources to provide accurate, cited answers. It enables teams to ask natural language questions and get precise responses by searching across documents, databases, and SaaS tools with full attribution. What makes it unique is its strong focus on data security, citation accuracy, and self-hosting capabilities for complete control over sensitive information.
keyFeatures: Connects to 30+ data sources (Google Drive, Slack, Confluence, GitHub, databases, etc.)
Automatic citation generation with source attribution for every answer
Granular access controls and permission syncing from source systems

platforms.name: DeepSearch AI
platforms.description: DeepSearch AI is an enterprise-grade semantic search platform that enables users to find precise information across vast, siloed data sources using natural language. It simultaneously searches internal documents, databases, and external APIs, understanding the intent and context behind queries rather than just keywords. Its unique value lies in its proprietary 'Deep Language Models' fine-tuned for search, which deliver high accuracy and relevance for complex, domain-specific inquiries in research, legal, and corporate environments.
keyFeatures: Natural language querying with conversational follow-ups
Simultaneous search across PDFs, Word docs, databases (SQL/NoSQL), and REST APIs
Proprietary fine-tuned Deep Language Models for search relevance

platforms.name: Nexus Search
platforms.description: Nexus Search is an AI-native enterprise search and knowledge discovery platform that connects to over 100 data sources—including SaaS apps, databases, documents, and wikis—to create a unified search experience. Its core capability is a reasoning engine that answers complex, multi-part questions with direct answers and verifiable citations, moving beyond simple keyword matching. It is uniquely designed for enterprises needing to unlock siloed knowledge, improve decision-making, and empower employees with accurate, sourced information.
keyFeatures: Connects to 100+ data sources (Slack, Google Drive, Notion, Confluence, GitHub, SQL DBs, etc.)
Reasoning Engine for multi-step Q&A that synthesizes answers from disparate sources
Automatic source citation for every claim and answer provided
